amazon.description: Search for product details on Amazon.
amazon.name: product_search

optional_params.description: Find products in a specific category/department (e.g., computers-intl-ship). Default: aps (All Departments).
optional_params.name: category_id

optional_params.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language, and currency. Default: US. Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: Return deals and discounts in a specific condition. Allowed values: ALL_DISCOUNTS, TODAYS_DEALS.
optional_params.name: deals_and_discounts

optional_params.description: A comma-separated list of product fields to include in the response (e.g., product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume).
optional_params.name: fields

optional_params.description: Return product listings with ratings of 4 stars & up.
optional_params.name: four_stars_and_up

optional_params.description: Only return Prime products.
optional_params.name: is_prime

optional_params.description: The language of the results.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: Only return product offers with a price lower than a certain value.
optional_params.name: max_price

optional_params.description: Only return product offers with a price greater than a certain value.
optional_params.name: min_price

optional_params.description: Results page to return.
optional_params.name: page

optional_params.description: Return products in a specific condition.
optional_params.name: product_condition

optional_params.description: Find products sold by a specific seller (merchant). Multiple sellers can be specified as a comma-separated list.
optional_params.name: seller_id

optional_params.description: Return the results in a specific sort order. Default: RELEVANCE. Allowed values: RELEVANCE, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST, BEST_SELLERS.
optional_params.name: sort_by

required_params.description: Search query (supports both free-form text queries or a product ASIN).
required_params.name: query

amazon.description: Search for product details on Amazon.
amazon.name: product_details

optional_params.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language, and currency. Default: US. Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: A comma-separated list of product fields to include in the response (e.g., product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume).
optional_params.name: fields

optional_params.description: The language of the results.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: A query to search and get more info about the product as part of Product Information, Customer Q&As, and Customer Reviews.
optional_params.name: more_info_query

optional_params.description: Results page to return.
optional_params.name: page

required_params.description: Product ASIN for which to get details. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by a comma.
required_params.name: asin

amazon.description: Search for product reviews on Amazon.
amazon.name: product_reviews

optional_params.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language, and currency. Default: US. Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: Only return reviews of the current format (product variant - e.g., Color). By default, reviews are returned for all product variants.
optional_params.name: current_format_only

optional_params.description: A comma-separated list of product fields to include in the response (e.g., product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume).
optional_params.name: fields

optional_params.description: Only return reviews containing images and/or videos.
optional_params.name: images_or_videos_only

optional_params.description: The language of the results.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: Results page to return.
optional_params.name: page

optional_params.description: Find reviews matching a search query.
optional_params.name: query

optional_params.description: Return reviews in a specific sort order. Default: TOP_REVIEWS. Allowed values: TOP_REVIEWS, MOST_RECENT.
optional_params.name: sort_by

optional_params.description: Only return reviews with a specific star rating. Default: ALL. Allowed values: ALL, 5_STARS, 4_STARS, 3_STARS, 2_STARS, 1_STARS, POSITIVE, CRITICAL.
optional_params.name: star_rating

optional_params.description: Only return reviews by reviewers who made a verified purchase.
optional_params.name: verified_purchases_only

required_params.description: Product ASIN for which to get reviews.
required_params.name: asin

amazon.description: Search for a seller's profile on Amazon.
amazon.name: seller_profile

optional_params.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language, and currency. Default: US. Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: A comma-separated list of product fields to include in the response (e.g., product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume).
optional_params.name: fields

optional_params.description: The language of the results.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: Results page to return.
optional_params.name: page

required_params.description: The Amazon Seller ID for which to get seller profile details.
required_params.name: seller_id

amazon.description: Search for seller reviews on Amazon.
amazon.name: seller_reviews

optional_params.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language, and currency. Default: US. Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: A comma-separated list of product fields to include in the response (e.g., product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume).
optional_params.name: fields

optional_params.description: The language of the results.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: Results page to return.
optional_params.name: page

optional_params.description: Only return reviews with a specific star rating or positive/negative sentiment. Default: ALL. Allowed values: ALL, 5_STARS, 4_STARS, 3_STARS, 2_STARS, 1_STARS, POSITIVE, CRITICAL.
optional_params.name: star_rating

required_params.description: The Amazon Seller ID for which to get seller profile details.
required_params.name: seller_id

amazon.description: Search for products from a seller on Amazon.
amazon.name: seller_products

optional_params.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language, and currency. Default: US. Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: A comma-separated list of product fields to include in the response (e.g., product_price,product_url,is_best_seller,sales_volume).
optional_params.name: fields

optional_params.description: The language of the results.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: Results page to return.
optional_params.name: page

optional_params.description: Return the results in a specific sort order. Default: RELEVANCE. Allowed values: RELEVANCE, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST, BEST_SELLERS.
optional_params.name: sort_by

required_params.description: The Amazon Seller ID for which to get seller profile details.
required_params.name: seller_id

amazon.description: Get the list of product categories on Amazon.
amazon.name: get_product_categories

optional_params.description: Sets the Amazon domain, marketplace country, language, and currency. Default: US. Allowed values: US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP, SA, PL, SE, BE, EG.
optional_params.name: country

calendar.description: Creates a new calendar and returns a unique ID (uuid) for it, which can be used to add events to the calendar.
calendar.name: create_calendar

required_params.description: A title that summarizes the new calendar (e.g., 'Work').
required_params.name: title

calendar.description: Searches for calendars based on specified criteria. At least one search criterion should be provided.
calendar.name: search_calendars

optional_params.description: The unique string identifier for the calendar. This will be an exact match.
optional_params.name: calendar_id

optional_params.description: A search query for the title field, which will be matched based on semantic similarity.
optional_params.name: title

calendar.description: Modifies an existing calendar. The only editable field is the title.
calendar.name: modify_calendar

required_params.description: The UUID of the calendar to be edited.
required_params.name: calendar_id

required_params.description: The new title for the calendar (e.g., 'Home').
required_params.name: title

calendar.description: Removes a calendar based on its UUID. Note that removing a calendar also removes all associated calendar events.
calendar.name: remove_calendar

required_params.description: The UUID of the calendar to be removed.
required_params.name: calendar_id

calendar.description: Creates a calendar event based on the provided arguments.
calendar.name: create_calendar_event

optional_params.description: A list of attendee emails.
optional_params.name: attendee_emails

optional_params.description: A list of attendee names.
optional_params.name: attendee_names

optional_params.description: A detailed description of the event.
optional_params.name: description

optional_params.description: The formatted address of the event location.
optional_params.name: formatted_address

optional_params.description: Indicates if this is an all-day event.
optional_params.name: is_all_day

optional_params.description: The latitude of the event location.
optional_params.name: latitude

optional_params.description: The longitude of the event location.
optional_params.name: longitude

optional_params.description: The place_id of the event location.
optional_params.name: place_id

optional_params.description: The unit of recurrence frequency (YEARLY, MONTHLY, WEEKLY, DAILY).
optional_params.name: recurrence_frequency

optional_params.description: Combined with the unit, this forms a recurrence rule (e.g., an interval of 2 and a frequency of WEEKLY means biweekly).
optional_params.name: recurrence_interval

optional_params.description: The end of the recurrence in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-12-31T15:00-08:00).
optional_params.name: recurrence_until_datetime

required_params.description: The UUID of the calendar this event belongs to.
required_params.name: calendar_id

required_params.description: A title or summary for the event.
required_params.name: title

required_params.description: The event's start time in ISO 8601 format with a UTC timezone offset (e.g., 2024-12-09T15:00-08:00).
required_params.name: start_datetime

required_params.description: The event's end time in ISO 8601 format with a UTC timezone offset (e.g., 2024-12-09T16:00-08:00).
required_params.name: end_datetime

calendar.description: Searches for calendar events based on a series of criteria. At least one search criterion should be provided.
calendar.name: search_calendar_events

optional_params.description: A list of attendee emails to be exact matched.
optional_params.name: attendee_emails

optional_params.description: A list of attendee names to be semantically matched.
optional_params.name: attendee_names

optional_params.description: The unique string identifier for a calendar event, which will be exact matched.
optional_params.name: calendar_event_id

optional_params.description: The unique string identifier for the calendar to search under, which will be exact matched.
optional_params.name: calendar_id

optional_params.description: The lower bound of the datetime range to search for a calendar event.
optional_params.name: datetime_range_lowerbound

optional_params.description: The upper bound of the datetime range to search for a calendar event.
optional_params.name: datetime_range_upperbound

optional_params.description: A detailed description of the calendar event, which will be semantically matched.
optional_params.name: description

optional_params.description: The formatted address of the location, which will be semantically matched.
optional_params.name: formatted_address

optional_params.description: A boolean indicating all-day events, which will be exact matched.
optional_params.name: is_all_day

optional_params.description: The latitude of the location, which will be matched with a 0.01-degree tolerance.
optional_params.name: latitude

optional_params.description: The longitude of the location, which will be matched with a 0.01-degree tolerance.
optional_params.name: longitude

optional_params.description: The place_id of the location, which will be exact matched.
optional_params.name: place_id

optional_params.description: An enum indicating the recurrence frequency, which will be exact matched.
optional_params.name: recurrence_frequency

optional_params.description: An enum indicating the recurrence interval, which will be exact matched.
optional_params.name: recurrence_interval

optional_params.description: The end of the recurrence in ISO 8601 format, which will be exact matched.
optional_params.name: recurrence_until_datetime

optional_params.description: The title summarizing the calendar event, which will be semantically matched.
optional_params.name: title

calendar.description: Removes a calendar event based on its UUID.
calendar.name: remove_calendar_event

required_params.description: The UUID of the calendar event to be removed.
required_params.name: calendar_event_id

calendar.description: Modifies a calendar event based on its UUID. Besides the calendar_event_id, at least one modification field must be provided.
calendar.name: modify_calendar_event

optional_params.description: The new list of attendee emails.
optional_params.name: attendee_emails

optional_params.description: The new list of attendee names.
optional_params.name: attendee_names

optional_params.description: The new unique string identifier for the calendar this event belongs to.
optional_params.name: calendar_id

optional_params.description: The new detailed description of the calendar event.
optional_params.name: description

optional_params.description: The new end time in ISO 8601 format.
optional_params.name: end_datetime

optional_params.description: The new formatted address of the location.
optional_params.name: formatted_address

optional_params.description: A boolean indicating if the event is an all-day event.
optional_params.name: is_all_day

optional_params.description: The new latitude of the location.
optional_params.name: latitude

optional_params.description: The new longitude of the location.
optional_params.name: longitude

optional_params.description: The new place_id of the location.
optional_params.name: place_id

optional_params.description: An enum indicating the new recurrence frequency.
optional_params.name: recurrence_frequency

optional_params.description: An enum indicating the new recurrence interval.
optional_params.name: recurrence_interval

optional_params.description: The end of the recurrence in ISO 8601 format.
optional_params.name: recurrence_until_datetime

optional_params.description: The new start time in ISO 8601 format.
optional_params.name: start_datetime

optional_params.description: The new title summarizing the calendar event.
optional_params.name: title

required_params.description: The UUID of the calendar event to be modified.
required_params.name: calendar_event_id

financial_market.description: Get a list of market tickers available for trading.
financial_market.name: get_market_tickers

optional_params.description: Enter one of the following asset classes: STOCKS, ETF, or MUTUALFUNDS. Example: STOCKS.
optional_params.name: asset_type

optional_params.description: Enter a page number.
optional_params.name: page

financial_market.description: Search for securities (stocks, ETFs, mutual funds, etc.) by name or symbol.
financial_market.name: search_securities

required_params.description: Search query string. Can be a company name, ticker symbol, or partial match. Examples: 'Apple', 'AAPL', 'Tesla', 'TSLA'.
required_params.name: search

financial_market.description: Get snapshot quotes for multiple securities (batch request).
financial_market.name: get_market_quotes_snapshots

required_params.description: Comma-separated list of ticker symbols. Maximum 200 symbols.
required_params.name: tickers

financial_market.description: Get a real-time quote for a single security.
financial_market.name: get_market_quotes

optional_params.description: Type of asset to get a quote for. Default: STOCKS. Supported types: STOCKS, ETF, MUTUALFUNDS.
optional_params.name: asset_type

required_params.description: Single ticker symbol to get a quote for. Examples: AAPL, MSFT, TSLA, ^SPX, BTC-USD.
required_params.name: ticker

financial_market.description: Get historical price data for a stock or security.
financial_market.name: get_stock_history

optional_params.description: Include dividend information in the response. Optional, set to True to include dividends.
optional_params.name: dividend

optional_params.description: Data interval/granularity. Default: 1d. Valid intervals: 1m, 2m, 3m, 4m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 1d, 1wk, 1mo, 1qty.
optional_params.name: interval

optional_params.description: Limit the number of candles returned. Optional, range: 1-1000.
optional_params.name: limit

required_params.description: Stock symbol to get historical data for. Examples: AAPL, MSFT, TSLA, ^SPX, BTC-USD.
required_params.name: symbol

financial_market.description: Screen stocks based on various predefined criteria.
financial_market.name: screen_stocks

optional_params.description:
Type of stock screener to use.
Default: most_actives
Available screeners:
- trending: Trending tickers in today's market
- undervalued_growth_stocks: Stocks with earnings growth
- growth_technology_stocks: Technology stocks with revenue
- day_gainers: Stocks with the highest gains
- day_losers: Stocks with the highest losses
- most_actives: Stocks by intraday trade volume
- undervalued_large_caps: Undervalued large cap stocks
- aggressive_small_caps: Small-cap stocks with earnings growth
- small_cap_gainers: Small caps with a 1 day price change of 5.0%
optional_params.name: list_type

financial_market.description:
Get detailed stock information organized by modules.
Available modules:
profile: Company profile and business description |  income-statement: Annual income statements | balance-sheet: Annual balance sheets | cashflow-statement: Annual cash flow statements | statistics: Key financial statistics | calendar-events: Upcoming calendar events | sec-filings: SEC filings | recommendation-trend: Analyst recommendation trends |  upgrade-downgrade-history: Upgrade/downgrade history | institution-ownership: Institutional ownership data | fund-ownership: Fund ownership data | major-directHolders: Major direct holders | major-holders-breakdown: Major holders breakdown |  insider-transactions: Insider transaction data |  insider-holders: Insider holders data |net-share-purchase-activity: Net share purchase activity |  earnings: Earnings data | industry-trend: Industry trend data | index-trend: Index trend data | sector-trend: Sector trend data
financial_market.name: get_stock_modules

optional_params.description: Single module to retrieve (one per request). Default: profile. See the description for a full list of available modules.
optional_params.name: module

required_params.description: Stock symbol to get module data for. Examples: AAPL, MSFT, TSLA, ^SPX.
required_params.name: ticker

financial_market.description: Get general insider trading information from the market.
financial_market.name: get_insider_trades

financial_market.description: Get the latest market news and financial articles.
financial_market.name: get_market_news

optional_params.description: Type of news to retrieve (optional). Available types: ALL, VIDEO, PRESS_RELEASE.
optional_params.name: news_type

optional_params.description: Stock symbol to get news for (optional). Examples: AAPL, MSFT, TSLA.
optional_params.name: tickers

holiday.description: Get public holidays for a specific country and year. This function retrieves all public holidays for a given country in a specified year. The holidays include national holidays, religious observances, and other significant dates recognized by the country's government or cultural institutions.
holiday.name: get_country_holidays_by_year

required_params.description: The year for which to retrieve holidays (e.g., 2023, 2024). Must be a valid 4-digit year. Most countries have data available for recent years and some future years.
required_params.name: year

required_params.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'US' for United States, 'GB' for United Kingdom, 'CA' for Canada, 'DE' for Germany).
required_params.name: country_code

holiday.description: Get the list of supported country codes for holiday data. This function retrieves all country codes that are supported by the public holidays API. Each country code follows the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard (two-letter country codes).
holiday.name: get_supported_country_codes

news.description: Get the latest news from various categories.
news.name: get_latest_news

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news. Default: en-US.
optional_params.name: lr

news.description: Get the latest news from around the world.
news.name: get_world_news

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news.
optional_params.name: lr

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news. Default: en-US.
optional_params.name: lr

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news. Default: en-US.
optional_params.name: lr

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news. Default: en-US.
optional_params.name: lr

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news. Default: en-US.
optional_params.name: lr

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news. Default: en-US.
optional_params.name: lr

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news. Default: en-US.
optional_params.name: lr

news.description: Search for news based on a keyword.
news.name: search_news

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the news.
optional_params.name: lr

required_params.description: The search keyword to find relevant news articles. Can be any topic, person, company, event, or subject of interest. Examples: 'COVID-19', 'Apple', 'climate change', 'Olympics', 'AI technology'.
required_params.name: keyword

news.description: Get keyword search suggestions based on user input.
news.name: get_search_suggestions

optional_params.description: Language region parameter to specify the desired language and region of the search suggestions.
optional_params.name: lr

required_params.description: The user input for keyword search suggestions. Can be partial words or phrases to get autocomplete suggestions. Examples: 'econ' (might suggest 'economy', 'economics'), 'tech' (might suggest 'technology', 'tech news'), 'clim' (might suggest 'climate').
required_params.name: keyword

places_maps.description: Returns canonical information including a unique place_id, latitude, longitude, and street address for a set of places based on a string query. It also includes common filter criteria like price_level, rating, and types. This service is particularly useful for handling ambiguous address queries in an automated system.
places_maps.name: search_place

optional_params.description: The country to search in, specified in lowercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format. This also affects language codes.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: The language for the results, specified in lowercase ISO 639 Set 1.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: The center latitude of the search radius. Must be provided with longitude and radius.
optional_params.name: latitude

optional_params.description: The center longitude of the search radius. Must be provided with latitude and radius.
optional_params.name: longitude

optional_params.description: Defines the distance (in meters) within which to return place results. The maximum value is 50,000 meters.
optional_params.name: radius

required_params.description: The text string to search for, such as 'restaurant' or '123 Main Street'. This must be a place name, address, or category of establishments.
required_params.name: query

places_maps.description: Retrieves more comprehensive information about a particular establishment or point of interest using its place_id. This can include the complete address, phone number, opening hours, user rating, and reviews.
places_maps.name: place_details

optional_params.description: The country to search in, specified in lowercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: The language for the results, specified in lowercase ISO 639 Set 1.
optional_params.name: language

required_params.description: The unique ID representing the location, returned by the search_place tool.
required_params.name: place_id

places_maps.description: Searches for directions from an origin to a destination with options for preferred departure/arrival times, various modes of transportation (transit, driving, walking, or cycling), and traffic estimates.
places_maps.name: get_directions

optional_params.description: The expected arrival time in ISO 8601 format with a timezone offset (e.g., 2024-12-03T22:26-08:00). Cannot be set if departure_time is also set.
optional_params.name: arrival_time

optional_params.description: The country to search in, specified in lowercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: The expected departure time in ISO 8601 format with a timezone offset (e.g., 2024-12-03T22:26-08:00). Cannot be set if arrival_time is also set.
optional_params.name: departure_time

optional_params.description: The language for the results, specified in lowercase ISO 639 Set 1.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: The transportation mode to use. Supported modes are driving, walking, bicycling, and transit. driving is the default.
optional_params.name: mode

optional_params.description: Specifies the assumptions for calculating time in traffic. Available values are best_guess, pessimistic, and optimistic.
optional_params.name: traffic_model

required_params.description: The place_id representing the destination, returned by the search_place tool.
required_params.name: destination

required_params.description: The place_id representing the origin, returned by the search_place tool.
required_params.name: origin

places_maps.description: Converts a place's information between an address, latitude/longitude coordinates, and a place_id. At least one of place_id, latitude/longitude, or formatted_address must be provided.
places_maps.name: convert_place_id_lat_lon_address

optional_params.description: The country to search in, specified in lowercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: The formatted address to search for.
optional_params.name: formatted_address

optional_params.description: The language for the results, specified in lowercase ISO 639 Set 1.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: The latitude to search for. Must be provided with longitude.
optional_params.name: latitude

optional_params.description: The longitude to search for. Must be provided with latitude.
optional_params.name: longitude

optional_params.description: The unique ID representing the location, returned by the search_place tool.
optional_params.name: place_id

places_maps.description: Returns canonical information about a set of places based on a string query and allows you to specify which fields to return.
places_maps.name: search_place_and_specify_return_fields

optional_params.description: The country to search in, specified in lowercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: The place data types to return. Acceptable parameters are formatted_address, geometry, name, place_id, and all. Multiple parameters can be a comma-separated list.
optional_params.name: fields

optional_params.description: The language for the results, specified in lowercase ISO 639 Set 1.
optional_params.name: language

optional_params.description: The center latitude of the search radius. Must be provided with longitude and radius.
optional_params.name: latitude

optional_params.description: The center longitude of the search radius. Must be provided with latitude and radius.
optional_params.name: longitude

optional_params.description: Defines the distance (in meters) within which to return place results. The maximum value is 50,000 meters.
optional_params.name: radius

required_params.description: The text string to search for, such as 'restaurant' or '123 Main Street'.
required_params.name: query

places_maps.description: Retrieves more details about a particular establishment by its place_id and allows you to filter which information fields to return.
places_maps.name: place_details_and_specify_return_fields

optional_params.description: The country to search in, specified in lowercase ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
optional_params.name: country

optional_params.description: The place data types to return. Acceptable parameters include formatted_address, geometry, formatted_phone_number, name, price_level, rating, types, reviews, delivery, reservable, opening_hours, and all. Multiple parameters can be a comma-separated list.
optional_params.name: fields

reddit.description: Search for content on Reddit across posts, comments, users, or communities.
reddit.name: search_reddit

optional_params.description: The type of content to filter and return. Default: 'posts'. Allowed values: 'posts', 'comments', 'media', 'users', 'communities'. Note: 'users' and 'communities' filters are only available for sitewide searches.
optional_params.name: filter

optional_params.description: How to sort the search results. Default: 'relevance'. Allowed values: 'relevance', 'hot', 'top', 'new', 'comments'.
optional_params.name: sort_type

optional_params.description: A specific subreddit to search within. Leave None to search sitewide. Example: 'wallstreetbets'. Note: Do not include the 'r/' prefix.
optional_params.name: subreddit

optional_params.description: The time period to filter results by. Default: 'all'. Allowed values: 'all', 'year', 'month', 'week', 'day', 'hour'. Note: Only applicable when sort_type is 'relevance' or 'comments'.
optional_params.name: time_filter

required_params.description: The search term to look for. Can be any keyword or phrase. Example: 'investing', 'best hiking trail in the bay area'.
required_params.name: search

reddit.description: Get posts from a specific subreddit.
reddit.name: get_subreddit_posts

optional_params.description: The type of posts to retrieve based on Reddit's sorting options. Default: 'hot'. Allowed values: 'hot', 'new', 'top'.
optional_params.name: filter

required_params.description: The full URL of the subreddit to get posts from. Must be a valid Reddit subreddit URL. Example: 'https://www.reddit.com/r/wallstreetbets'.
required_params.name: url

reddit.description: Get detailed information about a specific Reddit post, including comments.
reddit.name: get_post_details

required_params.description: The full URL of the Reddit post to get details for. Must be a valid Reddit post URL that includes the post ID. Example: 'https://www.reddit.com/r/wallstreetbets/comments/p0esdp/do_hedge_funds_beat_the_market_i_analyzed_the'.
required_params.name: url

system_settings.description: Gets the current system settings, including cellular service status, Wi-Fi status, location service status, low battery mode status, locale information, and timezone information (as a UTC offset in seconds).
system_settings.name: get_system_settings

system_settings.description: Sets the current system settings. At least one value must be provided.
system_settings.name: set_system_settings

optional_params.description: True to turn on cellular service, False otherwise.
optional_params.name: cellular

optional_params.description: The locale to set, in the form of <language>_<COUNTRY> (e.g., en_US).
optional_params.name: locale

optional_params.description: True to turn on location service, False otherwise.
optional_params.name: location_service

optional_params.description: True to turn on low battery mode, False otherwise.
optional_params.name: low_battery_mode

optional_params.description: The timezone to set, as the number of offset seconds from UTC (e.g., -28800 represents UTC08:00).
optional_params.name: utc_offset_seconds

optional_params.description: True to turn on Wi-Fi service, False otherwise.
optional_params.name: wifi

system_settings.description: Returns the current location's latitude, longitude, UUID, and address.
system_settings.name: get_current_location

system_settings.name: get_cellular_status

system_settings.name: get_low_battery_mode_status

system_settings.name: get_locale

system_settings.description: Gets the current timezone, expressed in UTC offset in seconds (e.g., -28800 represents UTC08:00).
system_settings.name: get_timezone_utc_offset_seconds

system_settings.name: get_current_latitude

system_settings.description: Requests the current longitude.
system_settings.name: get_current_longitude

system_settings.description: Requests the UUID of the current location, which can be used to query location detail information in map domain tools.
system_settings.name: get_current_place_id

system_settings.description: Requests the formatted address of the current location.
system_settings.name: get_current_formatted_address

system_settings.description: Sets the current cellular service status.
system_settings.name: set_cellular_status

required_params.description: True to turn on cellular service, False otherwise.
required_params.name: status

system_settings.description: Sets the current Wi-Fi service status.
system_settings.name: set_wifi_status

required_params.description: True to turn on Wi-Fi service, False otherwise.
required_params.name: status

system_settings.name: set_location_service_status

required_params.name: status

system_settings.description: Sets the current low battery mode status.
system_settings.name: set_low_battery_mode_status

required_params.description: True to turn on low battery mode, False otherwise.
required_params.name: status

system_settings.description: Sets the current system locale.
system_settings.name: set_locale

required_params.description: The locale to set, in the form of <language>_<COUNTRY> (e.g., en_US).
required_params.name: locale

system_settings.description: Sets the current system timezone.
system_settings.name: set_timezone_utc_offset_seconds

required_params.description: The timezone to set, as the number of offset seconds from UTC (e.g., -28800 represents UTC08:00).
required_params.name: utc_offset_seconds

system_settings.description: Returns information for a specific system settings field.
system_settings.name: get_system_settings_field

required_params.description: The name of the system setting to retrieve. Choose from cellular, wifi, location_service, low_battery_mode, locale, utc_offset_seconds.
required_params.name: field

system_settings.description: Requests current location information based on a specific field.
system_settings.name: get_current_location_field

required_params.description: The name of the current location info to retrieve. Choose from latitude, longitude, place_id, formatted_address.
required_params.name: field

time.description: Gets the current time, represented in an ISO 8601 datetime string with a UTC offset.
time.name: get_current_iso_8601_datetime_with_utc_offset

time.description: Given an ISO 8601 datetime string with a UTC offset, finds its ISO weekday (from 1 for Monday to 7 for Sunday).
time.name: iso_8601_datetime_with_utc_offset_to_iso_weekday

required_params.description: The ISO 8601 datetime string with a UTC offset.
required_params.name: datetime_str

web_event_search.description: Performs a real-time web search over a webpage index based on a textual query and returns a list of search results. NOTE: This tool is able to get contextual information from the web pages it is retrieving in search results
web_event_search.name: web_search

required_params.description: A concise search query targeted for a search engine.
required_params.name: query

optional_params.description: The number of forecast days required (between 1 and 14). This should not be provided with dt.
optional_params.name: days

optional_params.description: The forecast date in mm/dd/yyyy format, which should be between today and the next 14 days. This should not be provided with days.
optional_params.name: dt

required_params.description: A comma-separated string containing the latitude and longitude (e.g., 48.8567,2.3508).
required_params.name: latlng

web_event_search.description: Searches for local events based on a search query and returns a list of up to 10 results at a time.
web_event_search.name: search_events

optional_params.description: The date for the event. Choose from any, today, tomorrow, week, weekend, next_week, month, next_month.
optional_params.name: date

optional_params.description: If True, only virtual events will be returned.
optional_params.name: is_virtual

optional_params.description: The starting index within the search result list. Use this to offset and find the next 10 results.
optional_params.name: start

required_params.description: The search query, including the location (e.g., 'Concert in San Francisco').
required_params.name: query

web_scraping.description: Scrapes a web page's URL and returns the body content, with light boilerplate removal.
web_scraping.name: scrape_webpage

required_params.description: The URL to be scraped.
required_params.name: url

yelp.description: Searches for businesses in yelp. Returns a dict containing a list of search results, including basic info about the businesses.
yelp.name: search_yelp

optional_params.description: Number of results per page.
optional_params.name: limit

optional_params.description: If offset is set to 0, it means start from zero. If offset is set to 20, it means to start showing after 20 results.
optional_params.name: offset

required_params.description: String describing the region to search in. Enter exact locations. For example, use Roosevelt, NY not Roosevelt only.
required_params.name: location

required_params.description: Enter any search term you want, just like on Yelp. Ex. Coffee shop, Pizza shop, electrician, or plumber Ex. Black Owned Saloon, Mexican pizza shop
required_params.name: search_term

required_params.description: Comma-separated strings representing business ids. You can put up to 39 business ids on each request.
required_params.name: business_ids

optional_params.description: Business id.
optional_params.name: business_id

optional_params.description: Next page token. For next pages, if hasNextPage = true : Input the end_cursor value found from the response of the previous page to get reviews of the next page.
optional_params.name: end_cursor

optional_params.description: Only view reviews with the specified rating. Choose from All_ratings, 5_stars, 4_stars, 3_stars, 2_stars, 1_star.
optional_params.name: rating_filter

optional_params.description: Number of reviews per page.
optional_params.name: reviews_per_page

optional_params.description: Sorting criteria. Choose from Yelp_sort, Newest_first, Oldest_first, Highest_rated, Lowest_rated, Elites.
optional_params.name: sort_by

yelp.description: Get the menu from a Yelp business, if available.
yelp.name: business_menu

required_params.description: A string representing the business ID.
required_params.name: business_id

yelp.description: Get the popular dishes from a Yelp business, if available.
yelp.name: business_popular_dishes

required_params.description: A string representing the business ID.
required_params.name: business_id
